definitions.title: I.
definitions.body: seldom of things, [[בְּלֶב־יׇם]] in the midst of the sea Ex 15:8, Pr 23:34, Pr 30:19; [[בְּלֵב]] [[יַמִּים]] Ps 46:3, Ez Eze 27:4, Eze 27:25, Eze 27:26, Eze 27:27, Eze 28:2, Eze 28:8 [[בלב האלה]] 2Sa 18:14; [[בְּלֵב אׂיְבֵי]] in the midst of the enemies of Ps 45:2 (v. Br:MP in loco; AV RV al. in the heart of).

definitions.title: II.
definitions.body: elsewhere of men: †

the inner man in contrast with outer [[לבי ובשׂרי ירננו]] my heart and my flesh cry out Ps 84:3; ‖[[מעים]] Ps 22:15, Je 4:19, the inner for outer [[מעים]] Je 49:22; as within the breast [[על לב]] Ex 28:3, Ex 28:29, Ex 28:30, Ex 28:30 (P); [[מלב]] 2Ki 9:24; [[בלב]] Ps 37:15, 2Sa 18:14; [[סְגוֹד לִבָּם]] Ho 13:8; antithesis with [[בָּשָׂר]] Pr 14:30, Ec 2:3; head Is 1:5, face Ez Eze 14:3, Eze 14:4, Eze 14:7, arm Ct So 8:6; hands Ez Eze 22:14; bones Ps 102:5; eyes 1Ki 9:3 (= 2Ch 7:16) Je 22:17; ear Pr 22:17, Pr 23:12; mouth Ps 55:22; lips Is 29:13; [[אֲנִי יְשֵׁינׇה וְלִבִּי עֵר]] I slept but my heart waked Ct So 5:2.

the inner man, indef., soul, comprehending mind, affections and will, with occasional emphasis of one or the other by means of certain verbs: † [[בכל לב]] 1Ki 8:23 (= 2Ch 6:14) Ps 9:2, Ps 119:2, Ps 119:10, Ps 119:34, Ps 119:58, Ps 119:69, Ps 119:145, Ps 138:1, Pr 3:5, Je 3:10, Je 24:7; † [[עם לב]] 2Ch 24:4 (see [[לבב]]

); † [[כלב]] 2Sa 7:21 (= 1Ch 17:19) Je 3:15; [[תַּעֲלֻמוֹת לֵב]] secrets of the heart Ps 44:22, [[לֵב מְלָכִים אֵין חֵקֶר]] the heart of kings is unsearchable Pr 25:4; [[הַיּׁחֵר יַחַד לִבָּם]] Ps 33:15 etc.
specific reference to mind:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: † [[מִלֵּב]] of one's own mind Nu 16:28, Nu 24:13 (JE) 1Ki 12:33, Ne 6:8, Ez Eze 13:2, Eze 13:17; † [[חֲסַר לֵב]] destitute of mind Pr 6:32, Pr 7:7, Pr 9:4, Pr 9:16, Pr 10:13, Pr 10:21, Pr 11:12, Pr 12:11, Pr 15:21, Pr 17:18, Pr 24:30; [[לִבּוֹ חָסֵר]] Ec 10:3; [[אֵין לֵב]] Je 5:21, Ho 7:11; [[לב אין]] Pr 17:16; [[קנה לב]] get a mind Pr 15:32, Pr 19:8; [[כּׂחַ לב]] power of mind Job 36:5; [[רׂחַב לב]] breadth of mind 1Ki 5:9, [[גנב לב]] 2Sa 15:6, Ge 31:20 (E? see [[לבב]]

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: memory † [[השׁיב אל לב]] call to mind Is 44:19, La 3:21; [[על לב]] Is 46:8; † [[עלה על לב]] come into mind (occur to one) Is 65:17, Je 3:16, Je 7:31, Je 19:5, Je 32:35 (cf. Ac 7:23), so [[בא על לב]] 2Ch 7:11; † [[שׂם על לב]] lay to heart Is 42:25, Is 47:7, Is 57:1, Is 57:11, Je 12:11, Mal 2:2, Mal 2:2, Da 1:8; [[אל לב]] 2Sa 13:33, 2Sa 19:20 [[כתב על לב]] Je 31:33; [[קשׁר על לב]] Pr 6:21; † [[לוּחַ לֵב]] tablet of the memory Pr 3:3, Pr 7:3, Je 17:1; [[נִשְׁכַּחְתִּי כְּמֵת מִלֵּב]] I am forgotten as a dead man out of mind Ps 31:13.

spec. ref. to inclinations, resolutions and determinations of the will; † [[הכין לב]] set the mind 2Ch 12:14, Ps 10:17, Ps 78:8, Job 11:13; † [[נכון לב]] Ps 57:8, Ps 57:8 ( = Ps 108:2) Ps 78:37, Ps 112:7; † [[נתן לב לְ]] Ec 1:13, Ec 1:17, Ec 7:21, Ec 8:9, Ec 8:16; † [[נתן]] [[אל לב]] Ec 7:2, Ec 9:1; Ne 2:12, Ne 7:5, [[בלב]] Ex 35:34 (P) Ezr 7:27, Ec 3:11; † [[אֲשֶׁר־נְשָׂאוֹ לִבּוֹ]] whose heart stirred him up Ex 35:21, Ex 36:2 cf. Ex 35:26 (all P); † [[נְדִיב לֵב]] willing of mind Ex 35:5, Ex 35:22 (P) 2Ch 29:31 cf. Ex 25:2, Ex 35:29 (P); † [[נטה לב אחריּ]] inclined to follow Ju Jdg 9:3, Ps 119:112; † [[הטה לב]] 1Ki 11:3, Ps 119:36, Ps 141:4 cf. 2Sa 15:13:—[[גְּדׂלִים חִקְקֵי־לֵב]] great resolves of heart Ju Jdg 5:15 etc.
spec. ref. to conscience, [[וַיַּךְ לֵב]] [[דָּוִד אׂתוֹ]] and David's heart (conscience) smote him 1Sa 24:6; [[מִכְשׁוֹל לֵב]] offence of conscience 1Sa 25:31.

spec. ref. to moral character, God tries the heart Ps 17:3, Je 12:3; sees the heart and reins Je 20:12, tries them Ps 7:10, Je 11:20, refines them Ps 26:2; searches the heart and tries the reins Je 17:10.

definitions.title: 6 a
definitions.body: ); [[נִשְׁבְּרֵי־לֵב]] broken of heart Ps 34:19, Is 61:1; [[לֵב־נִשְׁבָּר]] Ps 51:19; [[שְׁבוּרֵי לֵב]] Ps 147:3; [[לֵב]] [[נִדְכָּאִים]] Is 57:15; [[לֵב טָהוֹר]] clean heart Ps 51:12; † [[לֵב חָדָשׁ]] new heart Ez Eze 18:21, Eze 36:26 (prob. also Eze 11:19 for [[אֶחָד]] see Co) etc.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[לֵב רָע]] evil heart Pr 26:23; [[חַנְפֵי־לֵב]] godless in heart Job 36:13; [[לב]] ([[י]])[[עקּשׁ]] perverse in heart Pr 11:20, Pr 17:20; † [[תַּרְמִת לִבָּם]] deceit of their heart Je 14:14, Je 23:26; [[בלב ולב]] with a double heart Ps 12:3 etc.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: the heart is uncircumcised Je 9:25, Ez Eze 44:7, Eze 44:7, Eze 44:9 and hardened: † [[חזּק לב]] Ex 4:21, Ex 10:20, Ex 10:27 (E), Ex 9:12 Ex 11:10, Ex 14:4, Ex 14:8, Ex 14:17 (P), Jos 11:20 (D:2 ?); † [[יֶחֱזַק לֵב]] Ex 7:13, Ex 7:22, Ex 8:15, Ex 9:35 (P); [[חִזְקֵי־לֵב]] Ez Eze 2:4; † [[הקשׁה לב]] Ex 7:3 (P) Pr 28:14; [[קְשֵׁי־לֵב]] Ez Eze 3:7; [[הכביד לב]] Ex 8:11, Ex 8:28, Ex 9:34, Ex 10:1 (J); [[כָּבֵד לב]] Ex 7:14, Ex 9:7 (J); [[כּכּד לב]] 1Sa 6:6; [[הַשְׁמֵן לֵב־הָעָם הַזֶה]] make the heart of this people fat Is 6:10 (?); † [[רוּת לֵב]]([[י]])[[שְׁרִ]] De 29:18, Ps 81:13 after Je 3:17, Je 7:24, Je 9:13, Je 11:8, Je 13:10, Je 16:12, Je 18:12, Je 23:17; † [[לב האבן]] the heart of stone Ez Eze 11:19, Eze 36:26 etc.
as seat of appetites, [[סְעַד לב]] stay the heart (with bread) Ge 18:5 (J) Ju Jdg 19:5.
as seat of the emotions and passions:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of joy and gladness, in various combinations of † [[טוב]], Ju Jdg 16:25, Jdg 18:20, Jdg 19:6, Jdg 19:22, Ru 3:7, 1Sa 25:36, 2Sa 13:28, 1Ki 8:66 ( = 2Ch 7:10) 1Ki 21:7, Es 1:10, Es 5:9, Pr 15:15, Ec 7:3, Ec 9:7, Ec 11:9, Is 65:14; various combinations of † [[שׂמח]], Ex 4:14 (J) 1Ch 16:10 ( = Ps 105:3) Ps 4:8, Ps 16:9, Ps 19:9, Ps 33:21, Pr 15:13, Pr 15:30, Pr 17:22, Pr 27:9, Pr 27:11, Ec 2:10, Ec 2:10, Ec 5:19, Ct So 3:11, Is 24:7, Zec 10:7; [[שׂישׂ]] Ps 119:111, Is 66:14, La 5:15; [[עלץ]] 1Sa 2:1; [[עלז]] Ps 28:7, Zep 3:14; [[רנן]] Job 29:13; [[גיל]] Ps 13:6, Ps 24:17, Zec 10:7; of desire, Ps 21:3, Ps 37:4; † [[דבּר עַל לֵב]] speak unto the heart (kindly) Ge 34:3, Ge 50:21 (JE) Ju Jdg 19:3, 2Sa 19:8, 2Ch 30:22, Is 40:2, Ho 2:16, Ru 2:13.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of trouble 2Ki 6:11, Is 65:14, sorrow Ne 2:2, Pr 14:3, pain Ps 55:5. vexation Ec 11:10, trembling De 28:65 (?) 1Sa 28:3, faintness La 5:17; it is wounded Ps 109:22 dies within one out of fear 1Sa 25:37 etc.; † [[לב נמס]] the heart melteth (in fear) 2Sa 17:10, Ps 22:15, Ez Eze 21:12, Na 2:11. †

seat of courage: [[יַאֲמֵץ לִבְֶָּ]] let thine heart take courage Ps 27:14; [[אַמִּיץ לִבּוֹ]] Am 2:16; [[אַבִּירֵי לֵב]] stout-hearted Ps 76:6, Is 46:12; [[לִבּוֹ יׇחוּק כְּמוֹ־אֶבֶן]] his heart as firm as a stone Job 41:16; [[לִבוֹ כְּלֵב הָאַרְיֵה]] his heart as the heart of the lion 2Sa 17:10.
